je.aar. jayawardhana shri lankawe palamu widhayaka janadhipathiwaraya lesa pathwanne 1978diya. 1978di path wechcha je.aar. 1982 janadhipathiwaranayata idiripath wune dewani wathawatath janadhipathi putuwe inda gannaya. 1982 janadhipathiwaranayata je.aar. idiripath wana bawa katawath aluth prawruththiyak wune natha. 82 janadhipathiwaranaye yu.an.pi. apekshakaya je.aar. bawa kawuruth hondin dana sitiyaha.
